$type?=outgoing{WWWOFFLE Index - Outgoing Requests} $type?=monitor {WWWOFFLE Index - Monitored Pages} $type?=lasttime{WWWOFFLE Index - Last Time Online Pages} $type?=prevtime{WWWOFFLE Index - Previous Time Online Pages ($subtype)} $type?=lastout {WWWOFFLE Index - Last Time Outgoing Pages} $type?=prevout {WWWOFFLE Index - Previous Time Outgoing Pages ($subtype)} $type?=http {WWWOFFLE Index - $type://$subtype} $type?=ftp {WWWOFFLE Index - $type://$subtype} $type?=finger {WWWOFFLE Index - $type://$subtype} $type? {WWWOFFLE Index - $type} {WWWOFFLE Index - Main Index} $typesubtype=$type$subtype $type?=prevtime{$type=$type$subtype $subtype=} $type?=prevout{$type=$type$subtype $subtype=}{} $typesubtype?=http{$type=$type/} $typesubtype?=ftp{$type=$type/} $typesubtype?=finger{$type=$type/}{} $subtype?{$subtype=/$subtype}{}

WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer

WWWOFFLE Cache Index

$type?{[Main Index]}{[Main Index]}
$type?=outgoing{[Outgoing]} {[Outgoing]} $type?=monitor {[Monitored]} {[Monitored]} $type?=lasttime{[Last Time]} {[Last Time]} $type?=lastout {[Last Outgoing]}{[Last Outgoing]} $type?=http/ {[http]} {[http]} $type?=ftp/ {[ftp]} {[ftp]} $type?=finger/ {[finger]} {[finger]}
$sort?=none {[Unsorted]} {[Unsorted]} $sort?=mtime {[Modification Time]}{[Modification Time]} $sort?=atime {[Access Time]} {[Access Time]} $sort?=dated {[Date Changed]} {[Date Changed]} $sort?=alpha {[Alphabetical]} {[Alphabetical]} $sort?=domain{[Domain Name]} {[Domain Name]} $sort?=type {[File Type]} {[File Type]} $sort?=random{[Random]} {[Random]}
